T04sanss07u:0: bhogapuṇyarakṣā saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ evaṃ tāvad ātmabhāvarakṣā veditavyā |
T04sanss07u:2: tatra sukṛtârambhiṇā bhāvyaṃ mātrajñena ca sarvatêti śikṣāpadād asya bhogarakṣā na duṣkarā
T04sanss07u:10: alpâdhamabhogenâpi kāryasiddhau satyāṃ svayam anyair vā
T04sanss07u:15: adhikasatvârthaśaktes tulyaśakter vā bodhisatvasyâdhikatulyakuśalântarāyakarau tyāgâtyāgau na kāryāv iti siddhaṃ bhavatîti ||
T04sanss07u:17: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrâbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvo bodhyaṅgair abhiyuktas tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyaṃ |
T04sanss07u:22: yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyād |
T04sanss07u:23: yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisatvâikāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ-
T04sanss07u:25: gāthāṃ prakāśayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati |
T04sanss07u:28: yasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra pātrâgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ
T04sanss07u:30: sacet punaḥ kaścid evâgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta |
T04sanss07u:33: sacet punas tasyônaṃ cīvaraṃ bhaved yan niśritya brahmaca-
T04sanss07u:39: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ tricīvaraṃ parityajya yācanakaguruko bhaven na tenâlpêcchatâsevitā bhavet |
T04sanss07u:40: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrâbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvas tena dharmâsevitavyaḥ |
T04sanss07u:42: anyathā hy ekasaṃgrahârthaṃ mahataḥ satvarāśes tasya ca satvasya bodhisatvâśayaparikarmântarāyān mahato 'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syād |
T04sanss07u:47: yo 'yaṃ vidhir ātmany uktaḥ so 'nyasminn api bodhisatve pratipādyêti kuto gamyate |
T04sanss07u:64: yo bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ prathamataraṃ bodhim icchati nâtmanaḥ |
T04sanss07u:67: kiṃ tu satvârthahānibhayād ayogye satve subharaṃ nâropayati |
T04sanss07u:68: yatra tu satvârthahāniṃ na paśyati tatra svayaṃ kṛtam anyena vā jagad dhitam ācaritam iti
T04sanss07u:71: yad ayam aparabodhisatvakuśalasiddhaye na svakuśalam utsṛjati |
T04sanss07u:74: atha tadduṣkhena me bādhā nâstîty upekṣate |
T04sanss07u:79: tasmād ugraparipṛcchāvidhinā pūrvavad ātmā garhaṇīyaḥ eṣā tu bodhisatvaśikṣā yathâryanirārambheṇa dharmasaṅgītisūtre nirdiṣṭā |
T04sanss07u:86: yan maitrīṃ ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca na tyajanti |
T04sanss07u:90: yat kāyajīvitaṃ ca sarvakuśalamūlaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayanti na ca pratikāraṃ kāṅkṣanti
T04sanss07u:93: yat pūrvataraṃ satvānāṃ bodhim icchanti nâtmanêti ||
T04sanss07u:100: yena dātur mahādakṣiṇīye mahârthadānān mahāpuṇyasāgaravistaro dṛśyate |
T04sanss07u:101: anyathā tu kevalam eva vighātino maraṇaṃ syāt ||
T04sanss07u:103: yâiṣa te mahārāja varṣaśatasahasreṇa parivyayo 'tra praviṣṭaḥ sa sarvaḥ
T04sanss07u:104: piṇḍīkṛtyâikasya bhikṣor yātrā bhaved evaṃ pratyekaṃ sarvabhikṣūṇāṃ |
T04sanss07u:108: asya kuśalasyâiṣa deyadharmaparityāgaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaitîti ||
T04sanss07u:121: na rūpahetor na varṇahetor na yaśohetoḥ |
T04sanss07u:128: sâivaṃrūpeṇa śīlaskandhena samanvāgato bodhisatvo daśabhir dharmair na hīyate |
T04sanss07u:131: tatra ca bhavaty apramatto bodhipratikāṅkṣī buddhadarśanam abhikāṅkṣate |
T04sanss07u:132: evaṃ brahmatvād buddhadarśanâbhedyapratilambhād dharmaśravaṇān na parihīyate |
T04sanss07u:137: śīlaskandhapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sadā namaskṛto bhavati devaiḥ
T04sanss07u:140: sadā pūjito bhavati gandharvaiḥ sadâpacāyitaś ca bhavati nāgêndrâsurêndraiḥ |
T04sanss07u:141: sadā sumānitaś ca bhavati brāhmaṇakṣatriya śreṣṭhigṛhapatibhiḥ |
T04sanss07u:144: śāstṛsaṃmataś ca bhavati sadevakasya lokasyânukampakaś ca bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ ||
T04sanss07u:148: yad utâkṣaṇagatiṃ na gacchaty anyatra satvaparipākāt |
T04sanss07u:152: evaṃ pūrvôtsṛṣṭasyâpi puṇyasya kleśavaśāt punar*upādīyamānasya rakṣā kāryā |
T04sanss07u:153: puṇyadānād api yat puṇyaṃ tato 'pi na vipākaḥ prārthanīyo 'nyatra
T04sanss07u:158: dattvā ca na vipratisāracittam utpādayitavyam iti ||
T04sanss07u:161: vipratisārāt pāpavat puṇyasyâpi kṣayaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ |
T04sanss07u:166: pāpasya daurmanasyenâiva puṇyasya saumanasyenâpattiḥ satvârthaṃ nirāmiṣacittasya prakāśayataḥ
T04sanss07u:168: punaḥ puṇyarakṣā kāmo lābhasatkārabhītaḥ syād unnatiṃ varjayet sadā |
T04sanss07u:169: bodhisatvo prasannaḥ syād dharme vimatim utsṛjet ||
T04sanss07u:174: yaiḥ caturbhir muktāḥ na vardhante kuśaladharmaiḥ |
T04sanss07u:181: paśyadhvaṃ bhikṣavâitaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvâṅgena praṇipatya cittam abhiprasādayantam |evaṃ bhadanta |
T04sanss07u:182: anena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmir ākrāntâdharaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakraṃ
T04sanss07u:183: atrântare yāvantyā vālikās tāvanty- anena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni
T04sanss07u:184: yāvad athâyuṣmān upālir yena bhagavān tenâñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat |
T04sanss07u:185: yad uktaṃ bhagavatâsya bhikṣor evaṃ mahānti kuśalamūlāni |
T04sanss07u:186: kutrêmāni bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti |
T04sanss07u:191: atrôpāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ
T04sanss07u:193: tasmāt tarhy upāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yad dagdhasthūṇāyām api cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ |
T04sanss07u:196: pratighaḥ pratighêti kalpaśatôpacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ pratihanti tenôcyate
T04sanss07u:198: āryagaṇḍavyūhasūtre ca samantasatvaparitrāṇy ojasaḥ striyā rātridevatayā pūrvâvadānaṃ kathayantyâbhihitaṃ
T04sanss07u:200: varṇād api balād api parihīyante smêti |
T04sanss07u:201: atra ca na kadācid unnatiḥ kāryêti pradarśanârthaṃ sadêty u-
T04sanss07u:206: iha kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ sumerumātram api ratnarāśiṃ labhamānaḥ pratigṛhṇāti |
T04sanss07u:211: taddhetoḥ tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ mahāvāriskandhâvaṣṭabdêva saṃsārasāgare unmajjanimajjanaṃ
T04sanss07u:214: tad eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya |
T04sanss07u:218: yathā duṣkhitānāṃ ca sarvasatvānām upajīvyaṃ karoti |taṃ ca dānapatiṃ samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayatîti
T04sanss07u:222: yadi punar asya taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ kīrtiśabdaśloko bhavati tatra nônnāmajāto bhavati na mānajāto na madajātaḥ |
T04sanss07u:224: na cireṇa kālena yasya câyaṃ kīrtiślokaśabdaḥ samutthito yaiś ca samutthāpito yaś ca kīrtiśabdaślokas trayam apy etat sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss07u:225: tatra kaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo 'nityeṣu na ca sthiteṣu dharmeṣv adhruveṣv anāśvāsikeṣv anunayacittam utpādayed unnato bhaven mānadarpito vā |
T04sanss07u:226: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo lābhasatkārakīrtiśabdaślokeṣu sûpasthitasmṛtir viharatîti ||
T04sanss07u:228: caṇḍālakumārôpamāś ca loke viharanti nīcanīcena manasā |
T04sanss07u:229: mānamadadarpâdhigatāś ca bhavanti paiśunyasaṃjñāyāḥ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitatvād iti ||
T04sanss07u:235: vairūpyaṃ me 'bhyudgataṃ vivarṇāni ca me vāsāṃsi prāvṛtāny anyaś ca me ākalpaḥ saṃvṛttêti nihatamāno bhavati |
T04sanss07u:236: muṇḍaḥ pātrapāṇiḥ kulāt kulam upasaṃkramāmi bhikṣāhetor bhikṣānidānam iti nihatamāno bhavati
T04sanss07u:237: nīcanīcena cittena caṇḍālakumārasadṛśena piṇḍāya carāmîti nihatamāno bhavati |
T04sanss07u:239: parapratibaddhā ca me jīvikêti nihatamāno bhavati |
T04sanss07u:247: kruddhānāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ satvānāṃ madhye kṣāntibahulo vihariṣyāmîti
T04sanss07u:254: sa kiyad dhīnānām api satvānāṃ rūpavikalānām apy avanamati praṇamati dharmagrāhyatām upādāyêti
T04sanss07u:256: syād yathâpi nāma bhagavan yadā mahāsāgaraḥ pratisaṃtiṣṭhate tadā nimne pṛthivīpradeśe saṃtiṣṭhate
T04sanss07u:257: tasya nimnatvād alpakṛcchreṇa sarvanadyaś ca sarvapraśravaṇāni ca prapatanti |
T04sanss07u:258: evam eva bhagavan nirmānasya gurudakṣiṇīyagauravasya bodhisatvasyâlpakṛcchreṇa tāni gambhīrāṇi dharmasukhāni śro-
T04sanss07u:262: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan yo bodhisatvo mānônnato bhavati mānastabdhaḥ na ca gurudakṣiṇīyebhyo 'vanamati na praṇamati veditavyaṃ bhagavan mārâṅkuśâviddho vatâyaṃ bodhisatvêti ||
T04sanss07u:267: dharmabhāṇakānāṃ viśiṣṭadharmâdhigatānām udāradharmadeśakānāṃ mahāyānasamārūḍhānāṃ nirvāṇapathavidhijñānāṃ dhāraṇīsūtrântarājapratilabdhānāṃ nâvanamati |
T04sanss07u:271: mārakarma dharmaśravaṇasāṃkathye ca niṣaṇṇae udāradharmavege samutpanne dharmabhāṇakasya sādhukāraṃ
T04sanss07u:273: prayacchati mā kaścid asmin praśaṃsatîti mārakarma ||
T04sanss07u:279: adhimānaṃ côtpādyâjānann abudhyamāno varṇârhāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ varṇaṃ praticchādayati |
T04sanss07u:283: ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vinayo bhūtam idaṃ buddhavacanam iti |
T04sanss07u:291: vṛddhasthavirāṇāṃ ciracaritabrahmacaryāṇāṃ na pratyupatiṣṭhate na ca pratyudgacchati |
T04sanss07u:307: kiṃ kuśalaṃ kim akuśalaṃ kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavati
T04sanss07u:318: sâivaṃ dharmavihārī sthānam etad vidyate yasmin mithyā mahāprapātaṃ patet
T04sanss07u:319: atha ca punar bodhicittabalâdhīnād aiśvaryaṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanss07u:324: yāni parivarjya bodhisatvā daśa jñānakarmāṇi pratilabhante |
T04sanss07u:337: satvakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetraṃ yataś ca buddhakṣetrād buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhâgamo bhavati |
T04sanss07u:340: sarvaṃ sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ ca satvān niśritya pravartate |
T04sanss07u:344: iha bho jinaputrāḥ prathamacittôtpādiko bodhisatvaḥ āditâiva sarvasatvānām
T04sanss07u:350: priyacittatāṃ anugrahacittatāṃ ārakṣācittatāṃ samacittatāṃ ācāryacittatāṃ śāstṛcittatāṃ |
T04sanss07u:354: parāṃś ca sarvasatvaśiṣyatvâbhyupagame pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmîty āśvāsaṃ pratilabhate ||
T04sanss07u:360: lokaprasādânurakṣârthaṃ tv āsanapādaprakhyālanakarma kurvatâpi cetasā strīṣu vâkṣaṇaprāpteṣu vā vinipatiteṣu bodhisatvena premagauravâbhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ ||
T04sanss07u:362: uktaṃ hi gaṇḍavyūhe tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāsiṃhâsane sarvaḥ sa janakāyo 'bhimukhaḥ prāñjalisthito 'bhūt |
T04sanss07u:365: sa khalu sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍala nirghoṣo rājā teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanenâttamanaskataro rājñânena ca trisāhasracakravartirājyapratilābhenâsīmâprāptakalpaparyavasānena |
T04sanss07u:368: teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītir adhyavasānam utpatet taddarśanâvitṛptatayā |
T04sanss07u:369: evam eva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatra maṇḍalanirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ |
T04sanss07u:372: to yāvat teṣu sarvayācanakeṣu ekaputrakasaṃjñā mātāpitṛsaṃjñā dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñā varṇasaṃjñā durlabhasaṃjñā duṣkarakārakasaṃjñā bahukarasaṃjñā paramôpakārisaṃjñā
T04sanss07u:385: mā bhāya bhikṣu mā bhāya bhikṣu |
T04sanss07u:387: āhara bhikṣu cīvarāṇi yāvat te dhopāmi |
T04sanss07u:388: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat |
T04sanss07u:389: mā bhagavān etasya glānasyâśucimraks.itāni cīvarāṇi dhovatu |
T04sanss07u:392: tena hy ānanda tvam etasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhova |
T04sanss07u:396: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando tasya glānasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhovati |
T04sanss07u:399: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandas taṃ glānaṃ bhikṣuṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cânuparigṛhya bahirdhā haritvā snāpayet |
T04sanss07u:402: yān ārādhya mahat tvaṃ virādhya kaṣṭāṃ vipattim āpnoti |
T04sanss07u:403: prāṇaparityāgair api teṣāṃ nanu toṣaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ ||
T04sanss07u:404: ete te vai satvāḥ prasādya yān siddham āgatā bahavaḥ |
T04sanss07u:406: ete cintāmaṇayo bhadraghaṭā dhenavaś ca kāmadughāḥ |
T04sanss07u:407: guruvac ca devatêva ca tasmād ārādhanīyās te ||
T04sanss07u:409: satvârādhanam utsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet ||
T04sanss07u:410: śirasā dhārayām āsa purā nātho yathêpsitam |
T04sanss07u:412: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśanty avīcīm yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt ||
T04sanss07u:413: mahâpakāriṣv api tena sarvaṃ kalyāṇam e-
T04sanss07u:416: svayaṃ mama svāminâiva tāvad yad artham ātmany api nirvyapekṣāḥ |
T04sanss07u:417: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam ||
T04sanss07u:419: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munîndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum |
T04sanss07u:423: satvavyathāyām api tadvad eva na prītyupāyo 'sti mahākṛpāṇām ||
T04sanss07u:426: tad adya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditās te munayaḥ kṣamantām ||
T04sanss07u:427: ārādhanāyâdya tathāgatānāṃ sarvâtmanā dāsyam upaimi loke |
T04sanss07u:428: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janâughāḥ nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthāḥ ||
T04sanss07u:429: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat taiḥ kṛpâtmabhir nâiva hi saṃśayo 'tra |
T04sanss07u:432: tathāgatârādhanam etad eva svârthasya saṃsādhanam etad eva |
T04sanss07u:433: lokasya duṣkhâpaham etad eva tasmān mamâstu vratam etad eva ||
T04sanss07u:436: yasmān nâiva sâikākī tasya rājabalaṃ balaṃ |
T04sanss07u:437: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcid aparāddhaṃ vimānayet ||
T04sanss07u:438: yasmān narakapālāś ca kṛpāvantaś ca tadbalaṃ |
T04sanss07u:439: tasmād ārādhayet satvān bhṛtyaś caṇḍanṛpaṃ yathā ||
T04sanss07u:440: kupitaḥ kiṃ nṛpaḥ kuryād yena syān narakavyathā |
T04sanss07u:443: tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ nṛpatir dadyād yad buddhatvasamaṃ bhavet |
T04sanss07u:446: ihâiva saubhāgyayaśaḥ sausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi ||
T04sanss07u:449: maitrâśayaś ca yat pūjyaḥ satvamāhātmyam eva tat |
T04sanss07u:450: buddhaprasādād yat puṇyaṃ buddhamāhātmyam eva tat ||
T04sanss07u:459: eṣā cônnatir ayoniśomanaskārāt saṃbhavatîti ||tasyânavatāre yatnaḥ kāryaḥ |
T04sanss07u:462: iha bodhisatvâikākī rahogataḥ pravivekasthito nâivaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss07u:466: ye tv anye śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sarve te saṃkīrṇavihāriṇaḥ |
T04sanss07u:471: iha bodhisatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇo na tan mahad vīryam āsvādayati |
T04sanss07u:475: ko hi nāma saprajñajātīyaḥ svakarmâbhiyuktaḥ parāṃś codayet ||
T04sanss07u:477: eṣa tu puṇyarakṣāyāḥ saṃkṣepo yad bodhipariṇāmanā ||
T04sanss07u:479: na hi bodhipariṇāmitasya kuśalamūlasyântarā kaścit parikṣayo yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt |
T04sanss07u:480: tad yathâpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahāsamudrapatitasyôdakabindor
